name: Firetea.ms
tagline: So long, and thanks for all the fish
body: **Firetea.ms** is no more. It was a fun little experiment, but never reached a critical mass. Head over to [r/fireteams](https://reddit.com/r/fireteams) or one of the plenty of other Destiny LFG sites. Once I get the code cleaned up a little, I'll publish it here. Good luck out there, Guardians.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
